name: BabyBubblez!
description:
DRAW the WindStream GUIDE the bubbles and BLOW DANGER AWAY!

It is a TOTALLY NEW EXPERIENCE combining the controls of LINE DRAWING with the gameplay of top-down ACTION/PUZZLE.   It’s EASY enough to pick up and PLAY for KIDS but builds and requires serious SKILLS before finishing. Drawing from our 15+ years of game making expertise, LEVELS are HAND BUILT using tried and true game design principles. And the BABY is SUPER CUTE and fun to LAUGH with.  

FEATURES
- Unique gameplay mechanic, the WindStream, guides the bubble and pushes enemies at the same time
- Art and characters inspired by children’s books and animation such as Winnie the Pooh™, Spirited Away™ and Looney Tunes™
- Achievements supported by GameCenter 
- Hand Crafted levels with unique layouts
- 18 levels with 4+ hours of gameplay

NOT FEATURES
- Killing
- Limited Lives
- Starting Over
- Redundantly Multiplying Enemies
- Rehashing Tired and Overused Phone Game Types
